docs.lead_paragraph: FOR as long as the vaccine for Hepatitis B has been in general use, some parents have been fighting it. Now it is New Jersey's turn.

headline.main: A Skirmish Over the Hepatitis B Vaccination

docs.abstract: Article on battle between New Jersey legislature and state Health Department over bill that would mandate Hepatitis B vaccinations for all school age children and amendment that would have given parents option of refusing; photo (M)
docs.snippet: FOR as long as the vaccine for Hepatitis B has been in general use, some parents have been fighting it.    Now it is New Jersey's turn.
